Package io.wcm.devops.conga.plugins.aem.util

Class ContentPackageUtil

java.lang.Object
io.wcm.devops.conga.plugins.aem.util.ContentPackageUtil
public final class ContentPackageUtil extends Object
Option property names for content package post processors ContentPackagePostProcessor and ContentPackageOsgiConfigPostProcessor.
